attributes.action: STOP PUTTING FLUORIDE IN OUR DRINKING WATER
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Let the British people decide if they wan't to use Fluoride. It can cause cancer and the government shouldn't be so dictitorial on what people should be forced to accept without consultation or choice. Stop taking away every little choice we have left in our day to day living.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
